data.title: Derby City Council
data.meta_description:
Derby City Council | 15,412 followers on LinkedIn. Derby is a proud city, where people are committed to making it the best that it can be. | We're proud of Derby and want to make it an even greater place to live, work and visit â€“ a city which is safe, strong and ambitious: 

Safe - where people are safe and the vulnerable are put first and supported.

Strong - where people work together, can enjoy good health and wellbeing throughout their life and feel that they belong to a thriving community.

Ambitious - where we support our children and young people to achieve their full potential, skills are valued, jobs and businesses are growing and we have the infrastructure to create a city for the future.

Calling all cycling enthusiasts! Following the announcement that the Tour of Britain Men is coming to the EMCCA region on Friday 6 September (Stage 4), this article highlights some of the riders that will be taking part in the six stage menâ€™s race: https://lnkd.in/eVrMtqBK Notable riders include Remco Evenepoel, a double Olympic gold medallist making his debut in the event, and Julian Alaphilippe, a former world champion and 2018 Tour of Britain winner. Ethan Vernon, a Paris 2024 Olympic silver medallist, and Jonas Abrahamsen, a standout from the Tour de France, are also competing. Image credit: SWPix.com

NEW STREETS ENGINEER/AREA MANAGER ğŸ“ƒ We are looking for an enthusiastic person, who like us, is interested in playing a part in the development of the Derbyâ€™s transport network within the New Streets Highway Development Control Team within Derby City Councils busy Traffic and Transportation Section, who is determined to make a real, positive change. ğŸ’° Starting at Â£43,421 - Â£46,464 a year â³ Full time or part time considered. Permanent The post holder will be responsible for the compliance of new developments and alterations to the existing Public Highway (Sections 38 and 278). The post holder will guide, manage and influence the team to ensure the delivery of a range of Traffic and Transportation services. Closing date: 09/09/2024 #TeamDerby #DerbyJobs
